page.title: 14Adult Leisure Time Survey
page.content: Most adults spend their leisure time at home doing a hobby. The most popular are reading, sewing, knitting, gardening and D.I.Y. Many enjoy watching T.V. video films and radio. Many adults enjoy sport, rugby, football, golf and keep fit, mostly local, but also nationwide. Many are members of a W.M.C. or pub where indoor games, such as darts, snooker or bingo take place.{ {Children's Leisure Time survey} Swimming and b.m.x. bikes are popular. Some boys belong to a football club and go training. They do press ups and have matches. Angela goes to girls brigade to sing and play games. Martin plays ball tigs at boys brigade. Stacy is a Brownie and was in a concert. Donna goes to play pin the clowns nose on at Sunshine Corner. Some childern keep pets.
